item.description:
Saturday at 8:00pm - Sunday at 12:00 am
GSU Metcalf Ballroom
775 Commonwealth Avenue
Boston, MA

Join BU HSC and hundreds of other people for the biggest Navaratri Garba in Boston!

GARBA. RAAS. BHANGRA.

Sargam Ki Shyam will be there all night to provide LIVE music!

Tickets will be on sale in the GSU Link (775 Comm Ave) during the hours of 10am and 5pm from 10/04-10/08:
$10 in advance
$12 at the door

Complimentary pakoras and samosas will also be served, so be sure to arrive early. There will also be plenty of water!

Doors open at 7:30 pm, and music starts playing at 8 pm!

Get ready for an incredible night!
item.name: BU Raas Leela (THIS SATURDAY!)
